title: How To Get Your Kids To Eat More Vegetables
summary: You don’t have to give up on veggies completely if your child doesn't like them. Some veggies are just easier for kids to accept than others. You can't expect your child to go from eating nothing but pizza to eating a salad with croutons every night. It’s important to start with baby steps and work your way up. Hiding vegetables in other foods is a great way to get your kids to eat more vegetables in their diet. Don't forget dessert. Dark chocolate has lots of antioxidants and will help boost your child's immune system.
